titleInfo.title: Liste des Valeurs de Dame Louise Doussan entre les Mains de H.M. Favrot, 1870 Feb. 7

mods.abstract: Baton Rouge. Financial statement for Louise Doussan's assets managed by H.M. Farvrot.
mods.note: Baton Rouge, February 7, 1870, 'Liste des Valeurs de Dame Louise Doussan entre les Mains de H.M. Favrot.'
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.

mods.note: Doussan Family Papers, Mss. 4800, Louisiana and Lower Mississippi Valley Collections, LSU Libraries, Baton Rouge, Louisiana.
